contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=107 |maint=[[Transports Québec]] |map= Route 107-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= |length_km = 38.8 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page 56, Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |length_round=1 |direction_b=North |direction_a=South |terminus_b={{jct|state=QC|QC|117}} in [[Grand-Remous, Quebec|Grand-Remous]] |previous_type=QC |previous_route=105 |next_type=QC |next_route=108 |terminus_a={{jct|state=QC|QC|105}} in [[Maniwaki, Quebec|Maniwaki]] |counties=[[La Vallée-de-la-Gatineau Regional County Municipality, Quebec|La Vallée-de-la-Gatineau]] |junction= }} '''Route 107''' is a north/south highway on the north shore of the [[Saint Lawrence River]]. Its southern terminus is in [[Maniwaki, Quebec|Maniwaki]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 105|Route 105]] and its northern terminus is in [[Grand-Remous, Quebec|Grand-Remous]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 117|Route 117]]. Sections of the route near its northern terminus are [[gravel]]. ==Municipalities along Route 107== * [[Maniwaki, Quebec|Maniwaki]] * [[Déléage, Quebec|Déléage]] * [[Aumond, Quebec|Aumond]] * [[Grand-Remous, Quebec|Grand-Remous]] ==Major intersections== {| class=wikitable ![[List of regional county municipalities and equivalent territories in Quebec|RCM]] or [[List of regional county municipalities and equivalent territories in Quebec|ET]] !Municipality !Km !Junction !Notes |- |colspan="5"|{{center|'''Southern terminus of Route 107'''}} |- |rowspan="3"|[[La Vallée-de-la-Gatineau Regional County Municipality, Quebec|La Vallée-de-la-Gatineau]] |Maniwaki |0.0 |{{jct|state=QC|Route|105}} |<small>'''105 SOUTH:'''</small> to [[Gatineau]] <br> <small>'''105 NORTH:'''</small> to [[Grand-Remous, Quebec|Grand-Remous]] |- |Déléage |5.7 |Chemin de Sainte-Thérèse-de-la-Gatineau |<small>'''SOUTH:'''</small> to [[Sainte-Thérèse-de-la-Gatineau, Quebec|Sainte-Thérèse-de-la-Gatineau]] |- |Grand-Remous |38.8 |{{jct|state=QC|Route|117}} |<small>'''117 SOUTH:'''</small> to [[Mont-Laurier]] <br> <small>'''117 NORTH:'''</small> to [[Val-d'Or]] |- |colspan="5"|{{center|'''Northern terminus of Route 107'''}} |} ==See also== * [[List of Quebec provincial highways]] ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.quebec511.gouv.qc.ca/fr/carte_routiere/ Official Transport Quebec Road Map] (Courtesy of the Quebec Ministry of Transportation) {{fr icon}} *[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&saddr=Rue+Commerciale%2FRTE-107+%4046.375129,+-75.980840&daddr=46.388622,-75.919304+to:Chemin+de+Ste-Famille%2FRTE-107+%4046.563842,+-75.727942&hl=en&geocode=5655326839006013133,46.375129,-75.980840%3B5218366578733196281,46.563842,-75.727942&mra=dpe&mrcr=0&mrsp=1&sz=12&via=1&dirflg=h&sll=46.404723,-75.881882&sspn=0.108901,0.30899&ie=UTF8&ll=46.470971,-75.804291&spn=0.217538,0.617981&z=11 Route 107] on Google Maps {{Quebec Routes (100-199)}} [[Category:Quebec Routes|107]] {{Quebec-road-stub}}
